## Esna 458 {-}

- Location: Top of column D  
- Date: Vespasian
- [Hieroglyphic Text](https://www.ifao.egnet.net/uploads/publications/enligne/Temples-Esna004.pdf#page=130){target="_blank"}  
  
Vespasian is beloved of:  
  
**South**  Nebtu         
**East**  Khnum     
**North**  Menhyt         
**West**  Nebtu
